column4: i could'nt manage to configure ivman..though install's easy..try the automount program
when you try to access a drive..say ls /mnt/cdrom, the drive will get mounted...config's much easier..forgot the details, google them up
For me it was easy.  Run as root, run as user, and it just worked.
But, if I have problems, I'll look into automount.
oh..good for you..but I was;nt talking about debs
Uh huh...  What package is automount in?
